Variable Documentation

◆ g_am_hal_sysctrl_sleep_count [1/2]

uint32_t g_am_hal_sysctrl_sleep_count = 0

◆ g_am_hal_sysctrl_sleep_count [2/2]

uint32_t g_am_hal_sysctrl_sleep_count
extern

g_am_hal_sysctrl_sleep_count is a running total of the number of times the MCU has gone to sleep. (Wraps around at uint32_t max)
